short_description: crown fine art is a warehousing & storage company based in hong kong island, hong kong.
long_description:
global art logistics - storage - transport - installation - specialist care
at crown fine art, we're just as passionate about art as you. our dedicated experts provide an exceptional global service that spans fine art transportation, installation, storage and everything in between. our in-depth knowledge and logistics expertise, earned over years of experience, is trusted by private customers, museums, galleries and auction houses worldwide. we ensure safety and discretion, and provide a smooth, efficient and cost-effective service from start to finish. tailored to your needs, our personal approach to every project sets us apart. the internationally renowned crown worldwide group established crown fine art to meet growing demand for specialist art storage, and the trusted expertise required to move art safely and efficiently whether it's across the city, the continent or the world. crown fine art now has over 50 years of experience and expertise in this field. today's company was formed in an alliance between gerlach art packers and shippers, oxford exhibition services and lavanchy. the legacy of each of these companies has contributed to crown fine art's vast global network and expert knowledge. #sharingthepassion
business_tags: management consulting services | art storage | fine arts | logistics & storage | logistics and supply chain
generated_description: crown fine art is a global company specializing in art logistics, storage, transport, installation, and specialist care. with over 50 years of experience, they offer exceptional services to private customers, museums, galleries, and auction houses worldwide. their dedicated experts provide a personalized approach to every project, ensuring safety, discretion, and cost-effectiveness. established by the internationally renowned crown worldwide group, crown fine art was created to meet the growing demand for specialist art storage and the expertise required to move art safely and efficiently. the company was formed through an alliance between gerlach art packers and shippers, oxford exhibition services, and lavanchy, and has a vast global network and expert knowledge in the field.
